entry.def: A weekend is Saturday and Sunday.

example.ex: She had agreed to have dinner with him in town the following weekend...
example.tran: 她答应下一个周末和他在城里共进晚餐。

example.ex: He told me to give you a call over the weekend.
example.tran: 他让我周末给你打个电话。

means.word_mean: 1. a time period usually extending from Friday night through Sunday; more loosely defined as any period of successive days including one and only one Sunday
